description_for_model: RH.Prompt101.fr provides optimized AI prompts for HR professionals. The platform offers 50+ prompts for recruitment, training, talent management, onboarding, administration, well-being, and HR support. It also features an opportunity matrix and a comprehensive strategic guide.
